short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access PantryChef features from any recipe website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the power of PantryChef to every recipe on the web. Instantly know if you have everything in your pantry to prepare the dish; use as a convenient method to populate your weekly meal plans or save the recipe for later in custom recipe books.
